item.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Rita’s Rewind physical editions announced for PS5, Switch
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/mighty-morphin-power-rangers-ritas-rewind-physical-editions-announced-for-ps5-switch

  • PS5
  • Switch

Due out on May 30.

Digital Eclipse will release physical editions of Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Rita’s Rewind for PlayStation 5 and Switch on May 30, the developer announced. Pre-orders are available now via Atari.com, Amazon, and participating retailers worldwide.

The game will be available in $34.99 / £34.99 / €39.99 standard and $49.99 / £49.99 / €54.99 Deluxe editions. The latter includes a special retail box and cover, SteelBook case, poster, 3D lenticular postcard, and individual pixel art collectible Power Ranger cards.

Here is an overview of the game, via Digital Eclipse:

Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Rita’s Rewind is a love letter to both 90s arcade gaming and the iconic Mighty Morphin Power Rangers franchise. With handcrafted pixel art, a guitar-driven soundtrack, nostalgic classic side-scrolling beat em’ up action with jokes and references to the TV and film series, the game has been carefully crafted to evoke the original arcade experience of genre classics. Players embark on a high-energy adventure with classic side-scrolling combat, exhilarating 3D sequences, and multiplayer Megazord battles to fight Robo Rita’s army of Putty Patrollers, General Goldar, and other villains from across the Power Rangers film and TV franchise. The game supports up to six players on all platforms in local couch cooperative and online multiplayer, except for Sony PlayStation, which supports four players. Digital Eclipse is adding additional gameplay and online improvements in the near future, and will share more details soon.

Developed by Digital Eclipse, the team behind Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Cowabunga Collection, Atari 50th Anniversary Celebration, and much more, Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Rita’s Rewind was digitally released in early December 2024. The game received positive reception from critics and community members alike, giving praise to the game for its engaging gameplay, vibrant visuals, and faithful representation of the Power Rangers legacy.

Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Rita’s Rewind is available now digitally for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam.

View a set of Deluxe Edition images at the gallery.

  • ❯

item.title: PLAYISM Game Show mini set for January 30
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/playism-game-show-mini-set-for-january-30

A sneak peek at PLAYISM's upcoming titles.

PLAYISM will host a PLAYISM Game Show mini live stream on January 30 at 1:00 a.m. PT / 4:00 a.m. ET / 17:00 JST, the company announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube (English, Japanese, Chinese).

The broadcast will feature a sneak peek at PLAYISM’s upcoming titles along with a brand new release announcement.
